articles.author: WGME Staff
articles.title: Invasive Asian longhorned tick discovered in Maine for the first time - WPFO
articles.description: The tick was found in Cumberland County.
articles.content:
Officials say the invasive Asian longhorned tick has been found in Maine for the first time.
The tick was found in Cumberland County.
The tick was submitted through University of Maine Cooperative … [+2613 chars]
